name: Everlasting Viking
description:
Welcome to the story of a Viking.  His brother have went ahead of him looking for the legendary place of Cheated Dey.   It is a mystical place where warriors are rumored to become invincible.

The controls are very simple.  To move, just use the left arrow or click to go west/left.  To each the main menu click [Esc]; the same key will allow you to leave the current menu area, and go to the previous.

I would appreciate comments and critiquing, but please do not give any spoilers.
